ECU Event

ECU Event contains an ECU event component in the reference FPGA. The ECU event contains measurements that are made on the corresponding ECU event. The measurements provide time related and/or angle related information synchronized to the Engine Simulation.

What do you want to do?

Add measurement(s)

To add measurement(s), click the Add Measurement(s) button. You also can right-click ECU Event in the configuration tree and select Add Measurement(s) from the shortcut menu.

Remove measurement(s)

To remove a single measurement, select the measurement item in the configuration tree and click the red X button.

To remove multiple measurements, click the Remove Measurement(s) button. You also can right-click ECU Event in the configuration tree and select Remove Measurement(s) from the shortcut menu.

View or change a measurement

To view or change a measurement, select the measurment in the configuration tree. The Channel page appears to the right of the configuration tree.

For more information about adding and configuring custom devices, refer to the Configuring and Running a Project book of the NI VeriStand Help, available by selecting Help»Search the NI VeriStand Help.
